content: नंदक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नंद्-ण्वुल्] {@--1@} Rejoicing, making happy, gladdening. {@--2@} Delighting or rejoicing in. {@--3@} Gladdening a family. --कः {@--1@} A frog. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the sword of Kṛṣṇa. {@--3@} A sword in general. {@--4@} Happiness. {@--5@} Nanda, the foster-father of Kṛṣṇa.
